lom:description.lom:string: The MS/PhD degree program at Cornell ECE prepares students to be future leaders in research, development, and teaching through rigorous course work and cutting-edge research. Our program is interdisciplinary, which enables a student to take advantage of the wide range of research opportunities on campus, from physics to bioscience, from mathematics to economics. Our program offers the flexibility that allows a student, in consultation with her or his Special Committee, to determine an individualized curriculum."

lom:title.lom:string: Graduate Electrical and Computer Engineering Curriculum - Cornell
